scripts.docker: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:tag && npm run docker:publish && npm run docker:tag:latest && npm run docker:publish:latest
scripts.build-docker: npm run build2 && npm run tag-docker
scripts.build2: docker buildx build --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD) -t drivereu/test-bed-time-service:latest .
scripts.tag-docker: npm run tag-latest && npm run tag-commit
scripts.tag-commit: docker tag drivereu/test-bed-time-service:latest drivereu/test-bed-time-service:$(git rev-parse HEAD)
scripts.push-docker: npm run push-latest && npm run push-commit
